name: CIRectangleFeature
desc: Information about a rectangular region detected in a still or video image.

items.name: var bounds: CGRect
items.desc: A rectangle indicating the position and extent of the feature in image coordinates.

items.name: var bottomLeft: CGPoint
items.desc: The lower-left corner of the detected rectangle, in image coordinates.

items.name: var bottomRight: CGPoint
items.desc: The lower-right corner of the detected rectangle, in image coordinates.

items.name: var topLeft: CGPoint
items.desc: The upper-left corner of the detected rectangle, in image coordinates.

items.name: var topRight: CGPoint
items.desc: The upper-right corner of the detected rectangle, in image coordinates.
